title: N162 Goodwin Champion Sexton great visual appeal
author: vwtdi

posts.post_title: N162 Goodwin Champion Sexton great visual appeal
posts.post_content:
How often do you see a card with a tack hole in SGC 20 plastic? Great eye appeal, I posted here for anyone trying to complete the set. If you think it's inappropriate Leon, OK to take it down. $100 OBO after listed for 3 days [url]snoopy1955@comcast.net[/url] thanks, Keith

[URL=http://s45.photobucket.com/user/vwtdi55/media/For%20Sale/n162sexton509.jpg.html][IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/n162sexton509.jpg[/IMG][/URL][URL=http://s45.photobucket.com/user/vwtdi55/media/For%20Sale/n162sexton511.jpg.html][IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f92/vwtdi55/For%20Sale/n162sexton511.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Great card Keith, hope all is well ol' buddy!!
